subject:
[cc-devel] [ cctools-Feature Requests-1704704 ] Ho do i enable the
	mp3 player?
body:
Feature Requests item #1704704, was opened at 2007-04-20 20:22
Message generated for change (Comment added) made by fourstones
You can respond by visiting: 
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=559969&aid=1704704&group_id=80503

Please note that this message will contain a full copy of the comment thread,
including the initial issue submission, for this request,
not just the latest update.
Category: ccHost
Group: None
>Status: Closed
Priority: 6
Private: No
Submitted By: sonicbb (sonicbb)
Assigned to: Victor Stone (fourstones)
Summary: Ho do i enable the mp3 player?

Initial Comment:
Hi how do i enable the mp3 player that appears next to upload title, just like on ccmixer?

Thanks for your time

----------------------------------------------------------------------

>Comment By: Victor Stone (fourstones)
Date: 2007-05-16 11:29

Message:
Logged In: YES 
user_id=489789
Originator: NO

"Global Settings"
"Playlists"
Check "Enable Playlists"

more info here:
http://ccmixter.org/media/thread/889

Enabling by default would mean huge overhead per page request on non-audio
setups.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Comment By: Jon Phillips (kidproto)
Date: 2007-05-16 11:13

Message:
Logged In: YES 
user_id=914868
Originator: NO

Yes, it would be great to get this enabled by default in music
installations.
